title: The Trouble With Her
description: It was supposed to be a holiday, a trip of a lifetime to discover myself. But the truth is, I was running from life back home. And away from my best friend.Andrew ‘Andy’ Baker is also family. At least—that’s how we were raised.Then, I fell in love with life in London.And I met Prince Charming. It all just fell into place until it didn’t.But I took a vow.And vows are not made to be broken, no matter how much it hurts to let go of a man you’re in love with.A man other than your husband…
author: Kat T. Masen
